About me.

I am a Data Scientist currently working in Petaluma, California. I recently attained a B.S. in Statistics and Minor in Computer Science from University of California, Davis.

I work to build data solutions to address real business needs.

Some examples of previous projects.

So let's get to the good stuff:

  • I built a system to implement distributed webscraping , gathering data in an effort detect fraudulent reviews on Yelp.

  • GUI automation to save my client hundreds of hours of labor. As a result, the localized database was later used to build KPI dashboards for various departments in the company.

  • I've dabbled in Text Mining and Topic Analysis on largely-unstructured job-posts from Indeed.com.

  • I made a primitive Distributed File System... if you're into that sort of thing.

I'd say I'm pretty hireable, but that's for you to determine (...No, not you, Mom... Sheesh).
